Name: RUNDOM
About the game: - Explore random levels and travel through them as fast as you can. - Use abilities to reach the finish line with lightning speed. - Follow the track to avoid getting lost on your way to victory. - Challenge the distance and break the speed limit. Features, that are planned to be introduced with first major updates*: - Online gameplay. Challenge you friends or random players. - Ghost challenge. Ð¡ompete with yourself, and beat your own records. - Endless mode. Run without stop. - Various movement mechanics. *- In this time current version of the game is being like such a supporter Early Access form, so if you don't want to face bugs or unjustified expectations, then you should refrain from buying this game, at least for now, but you can wait a bit and follow the updates to decide to buy or not, or try your luck and get the game on YouTube/Twitch/Instagram giveaway events.
